paper_abstract: We consider almost d-regular graphs, i.e., graphs having all vertex degrees equal to either d or d - 1. It is known that for each d' <= d every d-regular graph contains an almost d' - regular spanning subgraph. We give an algorithm for selecting such a subgraph in optimal linear time.
paper_title: Linear Algorithm for Selecting an Almost Regular Spanning Subgraph in an Almost Regular Graph
